title: October Prime Day is over but these Apple AirTag deals are still live
description: You can still save 14% on an individual AirTag or 19% on a four-pack, as of Oct. 10, 2024. Plus, see more leftover Prime Day deals on Apple devices.
excerpt: Grab a new Apple tracker ahead of the holiday travel season.
text: Grab a new Apple tracker ahead of the holiday travel season. All products featured here are independently selected by our editors and writers. If you buy something through links on our site, Mashable may earn an affiliate commission. Stock up on AirTags (and AirTag cases) before the holiday travel season. Best AirTags deals live after Prime Big Deal Days Best individual AirTags deal Apple AirTag $24.99 at Amazon (Save $4.01) LIVE BLOG: Get the latest news on October Prime Day 2024Now that October Prime Day (aka Prime Big Deal Days) is over, it may be tempting to wait until Black Friday to round out your holiday shopping list, but there's a pretty good reason to shop leftover deals while they're still live: the holiday travel season. Apple AirTags could be what protects you from a lost phone or suitcase during the hectic holiday season, making them a good item to pick up ahead of Black Friday — and while they're still on sale. Even though Prime Day is over, both the four-pack of AirTags and individual AirTags are still at the same prices we saw for the entirety of the sale.AirTags are especially great for Apple users, as they're easy to set up, and give you more range thanks to the way the tracker uses any Apple device with Find My to calibrate its location, even when it's far away from your particular device. We do want to note there many people had concerns that these devices could easily (and quietly) track people without their knowledge, but Apple has worked with Google to make sure that anyone — AirTag user or not — is notified via their device that an unrecognized AirTag is traveling with them. Obviously, these safety concerns aren't limited to just AirTag users, but we always think it's best to go in with as much knowledge about a product as possible before buying. With that said, here are the best AirTag deals following Prime Big Deal Days, plus some Apple deals that are still live. Mashable Deals Best AirTags deal overall Why we like itIf you want the best bang for your buck, this four-pack of AirTags provides a great value. At $79.98 for four AirTags, each one comes out to about $20, saving you $5 per AirTag over buying them individually — that's $20 in total savings. While this isn't the absolute lowest price we've seen this four-pack hit, it is the same deal that was live during October Prime Day itself. Plus, having multiple AirTags gives you the flexibility to use them on your luggage, your keys, your pets — basically, your options open up. Best individual AirTag deal Why we like itYou might already own several AirTags and just want one more, or you maybe you've never owned a Bluetooth tracker before and want to try one out before buying four of them. Whatever your reason, $5 off an Apple AirTag is a nice bonus, if not a huge markdown. html:
Grab a new Apple tracker ahead of the holiday travel season.

All products featured here are independently selected by our editors and writers. If you buy something through links on our site, Mashable may earn an affiliate commission.

Stock up on AirTags (and AirTag cases) before the holiday travel season. Credit: Mashable Photo Composite / Ian Moore / Apple

UPDATE: Oct. 10, 2024, 2:35 p.m. EDT This post has been updated with AirTag and Apple deals still live after the end of October Prime Day.

Best AirTags deals live after Prime Big Deal Days

Best individual AirTags deal

Apple AirTag

$24.99 at Amazon (Save $4.01)

LIVE BLOG: Get the latest news on October Prime Day 2024

Now that October Prime Day (aka Prime Big Deal Days) is over, it may be tempting to wait until Black Friday to round out your holiday shopping list, but there's a pretty good reason to shop leftover deals while they're still live: the holiday travel season.

Apple AirTags could be what protects you from a lost phone or suitcase during the hectic holiday season, making them a good item to pick up ahead of Black Friday — and while they're still on sale. Even though Prime Day is over, both the four-pack of AirTags and individual AirTags are still at the same prices we saw for the entirety of the sale.

AirTags are especially great for Apple users, as they're easy to set up, and give you more range thanks to the way the tracker uses any Apple device with Find My to calibrate its location, even when it's far away from your particular device.

We do want to note there many people had concerns that these devices could easily (and quietly) track people without their knowledge, but Apple has worked with Google to make sure that anyone — AirTag user or not — is notified via their device that an unrecognized AirTag is traveling with them.

Obviously, these safety concerns aren't limited to just AirTag users, but we always think it's best to go in with as much knowledge about a product as possible before buying. With that said, here are the best AirTag deals following Prime Big Deal Days, plus some Apple deals that are still live.

Mashable Deals

Best AirTags deal overall

Why we like it

If you want the best bang for your buck, this four-pack of AirTags provides a great value. At $79.98 for four AirTags, each one comes out to about $20, saving you $5 per AirTag over buying them individually — that's $20 in total savings. While this isn't the absolute lowest price we've seen this four-pack hit, it is the same deal that was live during October Prime Day itself. Plus, having multiple AirTags gives you the flexibility to use them on your luggage, your keys, your pets — basically, your options open up.

Best individual AirTag deal

Why we like it

You might already own several AirTags and just want one more, or you maybe you've never owned a Bluetooth tracker before and want to try one out before buying four of them. Whatever your reason, $5 off an Apple AirTag is a nice bonus, if not a huge markdown. We typically don't see them fall much lower than $25, even in the midst of shopping holidays.

More Apple AirTag deals

  • Apple AirTag key ring (mulberry) — $23.50 $35 (save $11.50)

Even more Apple deals

  • Apple AirPods 4 with Active Noise Cancellation — $168.99 $179 (save $10.01)

  • Apple AirPods Pro 2 — $189.99 $249 (save $59.01)

  • Apple iPad 9th Generation (64GB, WiFi) — $199 $329 (save $130)

  • Apple Watch Series 10 (42mm, GPS) — $380 $399 (save $19)

  • Apple AirPods Max — $394.99 $549 (save $154.01)

  • Apple MacBook Air, 13.6-inch (M2, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD) — $749 $999 (save $250)

  • Apple MacBook Air, 15-inch (M3, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD) — $1,449 $1,699 (save $250)

Bethany Allard is a Los Angeles-based shopping reporter at Mashable covering beauty tech, dating, sex and relationships, and headphones. That basically means she puts her hair through a lot, scrolls through a lot of dating apps, and rotates through a lot of different headphones. In addition to testing out and rounding up the best products, she also covers deals for Mashable, paying an especially obsessive amount of attention to Apple deals and prices. That knowledge comes in handy when she's covering shopping holidays like Prime Day and Black Friday, which she's now done for three years at Mashable.

She graduated from New York University with a B.A. in Journalism and English Literature. You can follow her on X @betallard and reach her by email at [email protected]. In her free time, you'll find her playing her Switch, hanging with her cat Mila, or cooking something new in her kitchen.
